meanings.definition: a person's state of mind regarding anger or calmness
meanings.sent1: His temper was calm as he faced the challenge.
meanings.sent2: She tried to control her temper during the argument.
meanings.sent3: Even though he lost the game, his temper remained steady.
meanings.sent4: Her temper was a tranquil lake amidst the storm of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's temper was like a gentle breeze, soothing the students.

meanings.definition: a tendency to become angry easily
meanings.sent1: His quick temper often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with her temper when things didn't go her way.
meanings.sent3: The cat's temper flared up when the dog came too close.
meanings.sent4: His temper was a volcano waiting to erupt at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The child's temper tantrum was loud and disruptive.

meanings.sent1: She tried to temper her excitement before the big reveal.
meanings.sent2: He needed to temper his criticism with kindness.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to temper the spices to create the perfect dish.
meanings.sent4: She learned to temper her reactions to avoid overreacting.
meanings.sent5: The artist had to temper the colors to achieve the right shade.

meanings.definition: to strengthen by heating and cooling
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith had to temper the metal to make it strong.
meanings.sent2: The glassblower knew how to temper the glass for durability.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to temper the chocolate for the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The swordsmith carefully tempered the blade for battle.
meanings.sent5: The potter learned to temper the clay for better shaping.

meanings.definition: a particular state of mind or mood
meanings.sent1: Her cheerful temper brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The somber temper of the funeral weighed heavily on everyone.
meanings.sent3: The festive temper of the party put everyone in a good mood.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious temper of the movie kept the audience intrigued.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful temper of the garden was a welcome escape.
